transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, good morning.
Executive: Yes, I'm Yoshika.
Customer: Hello, Yashika, Sanket is speaking from Apina Automation.
Executive: Okay, okay. Yes, sir.
Customer: Yes, Yashika, actually last time there was a name discussion. Is it a good time to talk, Yashika?
Executive: Yes, sir, yes, sir.
Customer: Yes, okay. Can you open the seller profile on your backend once?
Executive: Yes, I will open it. One minute.
Customer: Yes, sir, I have opened it. Tell me.
Executive: One minute, please.
Customer: Is your other company registered maybe?
Executive: Yes, ma'am. Techmont House name is my company registered in IndiaMART.
Executive: Yes, ma'am. Your number is registered, it shows.
Executive: Yes, ma'am. Actually, ma'am, there are no buyleads in this.
Customer: Yes, there are no buyleads, sir.
Customer: Now, let's see the buyleads. What is showing to you at your end?
Executive: Right now, I am seeing the first buylead of Uttarakhand. And Bosh, Bosh is written, B O S H, Bosh.
Customer: Yes, usually category, category we catch. We come straight to the category. It is written video recorders.
Executive: Yes. Network video, that is NVR. Brand is here Bosh.
Executive: Okay. Secondly, we come to after this video recorders.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Brand is CP Plus.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right. Third, we come to this boom barrier arm.
Customer: Which one sir? Boom barrier.
Executive: Yes, boom barrier. If you see below this.
Customer: You are telling the name of boom barrier. Aluminium boom barrier arm. Three leads have come from this. Yes.
Executive: Yes.
Executive: After this, if you see, then there is video recorder.
Executive: Actually, I want to explain this. I am showing you all these things because we have only NVR leads coming today if you see inside it.
Executive: NVR key. Okay.
Executive: Only NVR is coming and NVR is also that brand is coming in which we don't deal.
Executive: So these products are in this category digital video recorder and network video recorder.
Executive: Yes, this comes under NVR but challenge is that we don't deal in branded. So this is also not a concern.
Executive: Second concern is that like we have a search bar above for buyleads.
Customer: Yes, absolutely.
Executive: Here like I flap barrier like our category is flap barrier key. Okay, or metal door detector we search.
Customer: Metal.
Executive: Door metal detector you search. Door metal detector.
Customer: Door metal. Yes, searched.
Executive: Your category will come automatically door frame metal detector.
Customer: Yes, now I have a buylead showing metal detector gorge.
Customer: Yes, sir.
Executive: You will see here you will not show the lead.
Customer: No, I am showing sir metal detector gorge is showing.
Executive: We are not getting ma'am this lead.
Customer: Metal detector gorge is showing and door metal detector.
Executive: You have searched what?
Customer: I have door metal.
Executive: Door metal detector.
Customer: Yes, detector is detector.
Executive: Automatic ma'am its profile is in it.
Customer: Hmm. Metal. We are not getting any buyleads ma'am its.
Executive: This product key.
Executive: Yes, means searching there is nothing coming its. Now same as it is if I search something else or I search like our one more product is flap barrier.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Now I flap barrier if I search. So flap barrier key also no lead is coming to us.
Customer: One minute. First, I am this product key. Your same number is available on WhatsApp.
Executive: Hmm. Okay. Just one minute.
Customer: So I will send you its. I will send you its screenshot.
Executive: I will give you a screenshot.
Customer: Once you will recall your number sir.
Executive: 7533
summary:
Concerns:

- No buyleads are showing for products.

- No leads for flap barrier.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to check buyleads for products.

- Executive asked to search for flap barrier.

- Customer agreed to send a screenshot.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a screenshot.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, products, search
